skillTree.name: Test Their Faith
skillTree.description: Since the founding of Bretonnia, the Green Knight has challenged the Questing Knights seeking the Grail.

effects.description: [HIDDEN] Gives a percentage of XP received by this character to other characters of the same type. XP is evenly distributed as far as possible with fall-back priority given to higher ranked characters
Upkeep: +10% for all units
Enemy Hero action success chance: -100%
[hidden]
[hidden]
[hidden]
Hero capacity: +1 for Paladins and Sons of Bretonnia

skillTree.name: Green Mist
skillTree.description: The herald of the Green Knight’s arrival, the mist lingers on the battlefield and quickens Bretonnian Steeds.

effects.description: Speed: +10% for cavalry units

skillTree.name: Inspire Young Knights
skillTree.description: They may not yet be Knights of the Realm, but the Errantry Knights seek to prove their worth.

effects.description: Charge bonus: +25% for Knights Errant units

skillTree.name: Defenders of the Meek
skillTree.description: ‘Never to give up the fight until the foe be defeated.’

effects.description: Leadership: +10 for all Knight of the Realm units

skillTree.name: Stand Your Ground
skillTree.description: ‘A knight shall not flee from the enemy, nor retreat without proper tactical cause.’

effects.description: Melee defence: +5 for Questing Knights units

skillTree.name: Blessed Creatures
skillTree.description: The Lady protects the noble creatures that carry her faithful knights to battle.

effects.description: Physical resistance: +5% for Pegasus and Royal Pegasus Knights units

skillTree.name: Vicious Temper
skillTree.description: Already famously dangerous creatures, the Green Knight’s rage against the invaders of Bretonnia seems to inspire the Hippogryphs to even greater carnage.

effects.description: Melee attack: +5 for Royal Hippogryph Knights units

skillTree.name: Best of the Best
skillTree.description: To reach the Grail, the Questing Knights must first best the Green Knight in single combat. Only the most skilled will ever have this opportunity.

effects.description: Melee attack: +3 for Grail Knights and Grail Guardians units
Melee defence: +3 for Grail Knights and Grail Guardians units

skillTree.name: Vows of Fealty
skillTree.description: All knights must fight for the Royarch when commanded. The presence of the Green Knight reminds all of their vows.

effects.description: Upkeep: -10% for cavalry units

skillTree.name: Galvanize the Peasantry
skillTree.description: Even the peasants seek to join the Green Knight in battle.

effects.description: Recruit rank: +2 for infantry units

skillTree.name: Go for the Eyes!
skillTree.description: ‘Oi, we’ll get ‘em just like when we’ll till the fields!’

effects.description: Weapon strength: +6% for Spearmen-at-Arms, Men-at-Arms (Polearms) and Mounted Yeomen units
Melee attack: +3 for Spearmen-at-Arms, Men-at-Arms (Polearms) and Mounted Yeomen units

skillTree.name: Practiced Motions
skillTree.description: ‘I’ll be polishin’ the lord’s armour for years, turning aside a blow ain’t so different after all.’

effects.description: Melee defence: +5 for Men-at-Arms with swords units

skillTree.name: Seeking Knighthood
skillTree.description: Even a lowborn peasant, should he perform a sufficiently great deed or task, can be elevated to Knighthood. Perhaps even be noticed by the Green Knight himself…?

effects.description: Weapon strength: +15% for Foot Squire units

skillTree.name: Encouraged Fanaticism
skillTree.description: For the zealous peasantry that follow the Grail Knights, the opportunity to assist the Green Knight, in however small a way, is too great to pass up.

effects.description: Melee attack: +5 for Battle Pilgrims and Grail Reliquae units

skillTree.name: Inspired Commoners
skillTree.description: They may not be brave, strong, wise, or skilled; their aim may be poor, their bowstrings frayed, and their arrows splintered, but damned if they’re not excitable.

effects.description: Missile strength: +10% for Peasant Bowmen, Herrimaults and Mounted Yeomen Archers units
Range: +10% for Peasant Bowmen, Herrimaults and Mounted Yeomen Archers units

skillTree.name: Motivated Servants
skillTree.description: ‘From here we’ll be seein’ the charge of the gallant knights as they break the foe! We’re far better off servin’ back here than on the frontlines.’

effects.description: Reload time reduction: +15% for Trebuchet units

skillTree.name: Peasant Rumors
skillTree.description: ‘I’ll be dead but not for the Green Knight appearin’ to turn aside the orc’s blade and relieve his head from his body!’

effects.description: Leadership: +5 for infantry units
Armour: +5 for all non-Knight units

skillTree.name: Renowned Hero
skillTree.description: The tales of the Green Knight are told to every Bretonnian, from the lowliest peasant to the mightiest knight.

effects.description: Leadership aura size: +50%

skillTree.name: Power of the Fey
skillTree.description: Serving at the Lady’s side, the Green Knight channels her power into every blow.

effects.description: Weapon strength: +30%

skillTree.name: Duels of Legend
skillTree.description: The Questing Knights seek the Grail. Their final test is to defeat the Green Knight in single combat. Few survive this final ordeal.

effects.description: Melee attack: +15

skillTree.name: Paragon of Bretonnia
skillTree.description: The Green Knight smashes into the foe, with all the weight and power of a full Bretonnian regiment.

effects.description: Charge bonus: +50%

skillTree.name: Wyrm-Slayer
skillTree.description: Legend holds that Gilles le Breton slew the great red wyrm, Smearghus, by plunging his sword through the creature’s eye.

effects.description: Bonus vs Large: +25

skillTree.name: Strength of the Lady
skillTree.description: Who are you to face the Green Knight, who has fought every beast and horror imaginable, and triumphed?

effects.description: Hit points: +20%

skillTree.name: None Shall Pass!
skillTree.description: The famous declaration of the Green Knight inspires every Bretonnian.

effects.description: Ability: "Call of the Lady"
Ability: "Withstand!"

skillTree.name: Blessings of Shallya
skillTree.description: Their burdens lessened, their pains alleviated, their minds eased, the soldiers of Bretonnia travel far and wide in defense of the nation.

effects.description: Campaign movement range: +10% for armies

skillTree.name: Knightly Tournaments
skillTree.description: Seeking honor and renown, the knights set to challenging each other to friendly duels.

effects.description: Unit experience gain per turn: +200

skillTree.name: To the Defense!
skillTree.description: Bretonnians, sally forth! We must defend the Kingdom!

effects.description: Reinforcement range: +25%

skillTree.name: Legendary Chivalry
skillTree.description: True paragons of virtue ride forth, inspired by Bretonnia’s most legendary hero.

effects.description: Lord recruit rank: +4
Hero recruit rank: +4

skillTree.name: Unwavering Loyalty
skillTree.description: Even the naturally weak-minded peasant, normally unsteady of heart and mind, have their resolve strengthened by the Green Knight’s presence.

effects.description: Public order: +1

skillTree.name: Voluntary Tithes
skillTree.description: Though the nobles are not required to tithe when visiting a brotherhood shrine or temple, the tales of the Green Knight have inspired them to unusual generosity.

effects.description: Tax rate: +25%

skillTree.name: Sacred Sites of Power
skillTree.description: The Lady manifests in many sacred locations throughout Bretonnia, driving evil from the lands.

effects.description: Untainted: +2

skillTree.name: Rationing Supplies
skillTree.description: In times of war, even the great lords and heroes of Bretonnia will ration supplies (mostly from their servants).

effects.description: Upkeep: -10% for Lords and Heroes

skillTree.name: Triumph or Fall
skillTree.description: ‘A knight shall not allow himself to be captured alive.’

effects.description: Leadership: +10 for Lords and embedded Heroes

skillTree.name: Purified Waters
skillTree.description: Blessed by the Lady, the Bretonnian lakes are filled with the purest water, healing the battle wounds of the chivalrous and faithful.

effects.description: Constant casualty replenishment rate: +5%

skillTree.name: Wisdom of the Ages
skillTree.description: Never before has Bretonnia seen such a golden age of progress and chivalry.

effects.description: Research rate: +25%
